title: Control for android wear
summary: This app allow you to view your android watch accessories with a simple tap
description: Are you curious about your watch?View your wear system statusView your wear device informationView your android wear watch with a tap and  know what is in your watch.View/Set airplane mode on/off from watch seetingsView battery levelView/Set Bluetooth on/offView location status on/offView/Set screen brightness levelView/Set screen time offView/Set sound mode silent/vibrate/soundView Wi-Fi status on/off
descriptionHTML:
Are you curious about your watch?
View your wear system status
View your wear device information

View your android wear watch with a tap and know what is in your watch.

View/Set airplane mode on/off from watch seetings
View battery level
View/Set Bluetooth on/off
View location status on/off
View/Set screen brightness level
View/Set screen time off
View/Set sound mode silent/vibrate/sound
View Wi-Fi status on/off
comments: Looks nice on Google Play, never appears on watch. Appears on the phone so you know it installed.   But never appears on the watch.  Don't waste your time.  Nothing to see here (on your watch) .
No go. App does not appear on my LG G watch R and when I open the app on my Samsung Galaxy Note 3 I just get an information screen and nothing else.
Doesnt work on 360 as someone else said.  *** EDIT ***  New version still doesn`t work. however increased to 3 stars because developer took time to reply to first review AND tried to fix problem.
Not working yet on moto360 Looks awesome but I cannot get it to launch says unfortunately controls has stopped as soon as I try to launch it

Well, I tried. Never appeared in the Zen Watch. But, the Zen got herky jerky, and suddenly started nagging about missing Google Play Services. I factory reset watch and started over again. Sigh. The dev's stopwatch app works great though. Go figure.
